name: homebridge-tuya-smartlamp
description: Homebridge plugin for Tuya/Lohas Led Smart Lamp

scripts.hb:test: cp -a index.js lib config/node_modules/homebridge-tuya-smartlamp/ && homebridge -D -P config/node_modules/ -U config/ || true
scripts.hb:dev: cp -a index.js lib config/node_modules/homebridge-tuya-smartlamp/ && DEBUG=Tuya* homebridge -D -P config/node_modules/ -U config/ || true

author: SLaweck <slaweck7@gmail.com>
